_source.short_desc: Allows contractors to post projects, send bid invites, share information with subcontractors and manage multiple team members
_source.long_desc:
PlanHub is free construction plan room and bid management software that allows general contractors to post projects, send bid invites, share information with subcontractors, suppliers, and vendor. There is no limit on the number of users per company.

Subcontractors can register for free and start on a free trial to view projects, download project specs, and submit a bid. After the free trial ends, the user can choose to go on a PlanHub Basic Plan, or upgrade to PlanHub Premier.

related_products.short_desc: The leading accounting software for small businesses. Instant access to customer, vendor and employee information.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Enterprise (For a Limited Time, Save Up to 55%, Sale Ends 12/3!) is an end-to-end construction software that can grow with your business. It provides all the tools your construction business needs, yet is easy to use. You can organize your books, manage inventory, track sales, and even run payroll, but at the fraction of the cost. With QuickBooks Enterprise, you save thousands of dollars a year vs. comparable solutions. Take a free test drive today.

related_products.short_desc: Procore Estimating Software is purpose built for the construction industry. Adjust material prices, labor units, & profit margins.
related_products.features: Upload plans and perform a quantity takeoff using a customizable database of parts, assemblies, equipment, and services. Leverage auto-count and plan overlay to speed up the takeoff process. Takeoff data flows directly to construction estimating software ensuring ease of use. Simply adjust material prices, labor units, profit margins, and create a customer-facing construction proposal.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud based project management tool with features that include scheduling, estimating, bidding, job costing, selections and many more.
related_products.features: Buildertrend is the No. 1, cloud-based construction project management software for homebuilders, remodelers and specialty contractors. Since 2006, we have empowered the construction industry with a better way to build. More than 1 million users across the globe have chosen Buildertrend as their platform for real-time collaboration. Our software helps construction professionals complete projects while reducing delays, eliminating communication errors and increasing customer satisfaction.

related_products.short_desc: Bid & Win More Profitable Work in Less Time with STACK! Cloud-based, Free Support/Training. Create Your Free Account Today!
related_products.features:
STACK takeoff and estimating software is easy-to-use, packed with features to speed up your bid process and cloud-based, so you can collaborate with your team in real-time from anywhere. Best of all, access to STACK is now FREE!

 Access project plans anytime, anywhere, from any device
 Bid more work, in less time.
 Eliminate costly estimating errors.
 Leverage a library of pre-built & custom material databases.
 Win more profitable work!

related_products.short_desc: Web-based residential construction estimating software to handle estimates, bids, contracts, selections and more.
related_products.features: CoConstruct is the #1 highest-rated residential construction estimating tool for custom builders and remodelers. It?s the only all-in-one tool for custom home builders and remodelers that allows you to enter your data once, and have that information flow through the estimate to the specs, selections, bid requests, proposals, change orders, purchase orders, and budget ? including a full integration with QuickBooks.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Online Advanced (Save 50%) helps general & specialty contractors organize their books, complete tasks faster with automated approvals, reminders, batch invoicing & customized access by role in the field or the office. Turn estimates into invoices & track project profitability with advanced reporting, track employees' hours with our TSheets integration, and use our Intuit Field Service Management (IFSM) add-on for work order scheduling & dispatch system. All with 24/7 support.

related_products.short_desc: Estimating, Project Management and Productivity Tools for Construction Projects.
related_products.features: Discover how over 500,000 pros in 75 countries estimate faster and more accurately with UDA ConstructionSuite. Designed for general contractors, residential builders, and subcontractors, ConstructionSuite manages over $65 billion in projects and features real estimating with industry-specific tools like RSMeans Cost Data, AIA payment applications, estimate templates, true bi-directional QuickBooks integration, Change Order management, and integration with leading CAD programs. Get started today.

related_products.short_desc: For infrastructure contractors bidding projects ranging from $1,000 to over $1 billion.
related_products.features: Used by more than 50,000 estimators and 48 of the ENR Top 50 heavy civil contractors, HeavyBid estimating software quickly and accurately prepares a detailed cost estimate based on previous work; and then easily convert it into a bid. Plus, compare subcontractor and supplier quotes and conduct self-perform versus subcontractor analysis.

related_products.short_desc:
Ready to level up your business?

Be more professional, profitable, organized, and efficient. 

Free consultation. Free trial.
related_products.features:

Does your team know what's going on with your customers?

related_products.short_desc: Houzz Pro is the #1 construction estimating and business management solution for contractors.
related_products.features: Houzz Pro is the #1 construction estimating and business management solution for contractors. Get an all-in-one solution that spans the full customer lifecycle, including estimates, takeoffs, marketing, CRM, 3D floor plans, project management, collaboration, online invoicing & payments, QuickBooks integration, and a client portal. Start a free trial to see why thousands of Pros trust Houzz Pro to grow & manage their business. Plans are available for all business sizes starting at $49/month.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by +850,000 pros as the all-in-one construction management software designed to help finish jobs on time and under budget.
related_products.features: ConstructionOnline is trusted by +850,000 pros as the all-in-one construction management software designed to help finish jobs on time and under budget. Increase profits with integrated estimating & takeoff, change order tracking, and client selections. Avoid delays with Gantt chart scheduling and centralized communication. Real-time dashboards help you and your team make informed decisions and keep projects on track and on target. Get your demo and see how to build better, faster & smarter.

Time Cards, Estimates, Online Payments, Daily Logs, Scheduling, and 35 other great features.

similar_products.short_desc: Square Takeoff is a 100% cloud-based takeoff and estimating solution for small to medium-sized subcontractors, builders, and suppliers.
similar_products.features: Square Takeoff is a 100% cloud-based takeoff and estimating solution for small- to medium-sized subcontractors, builders, and suppliers for residential or commercial needs. From general contracting to plumbing, we support any trade on PC/iOS or mobile devices. Upload digital blueprints and share or make changes to the job from anywhere. Manage your project bids, calculate square footage, materials, and labor, and set notifications and reminders for smooth project collaboration.

similar_products.short_desc: RSMeans Data Online (save 15% when bundling training) is cloud-based access to North America's leading construction cost database.
similar_products.features: RSMeans Data Online (save 15% when bundling training) provides accurate and up-to-date construction estimating cost data that helps owners, architects, cost engineers and contractors precisely project and control the cost of projects. Create square foot, assembly and unit line item estimates and share them with ease. Stay on top of price changes by setting alerts on commonly referenced materials and tasks. Project costs up to 3 years in the future with our industry-leading Predictive Cost Model.

similar_products.short_desc: Trimble Accubid Anywhere is an easy to manage Estimating, Change Management, and Pricing solution hosted in the cloud.
similar_products.features:
Trimble Accubid Anywhere is the first of its kind, a fully hosted, hassle-free IT experience. Connect from anywhere at any time, allowing you to focus on what you do best, win work! 

Accubid Anywhere offers robust estimating features such as true multiuser and multi-branch support, allowing seamless collaboration between departments both simultaneously and without restrictions. Finally, fully integrated pricing technology gives you the tools to ensure up-to-date pricing for all your projects.

similar_products.short_desc: The Business Productivity Tool that helps home improvement contractors manage workflow, employees, sales, and field operations.
similar_products.features: JobProgress is the all-in-one cloud-based Business Management App for Contractors. Our platform equips contractors with an easy-to-use tool that produces unparalleled results by enabling you to control, organize, and manage your business from anywhere, at any time. JobProgress is both simple and powerful, promoting teamwork and efficiency while cutting down on busywork. We designed our platform so that you, and your team, can intuitively track, monitor, and measure your progress with ease.

similar_products.short_desc: Save Time & Win More Bids with ProEst Construction Estimating Software
similar_products.features: ProEst is the industry's leading cloud-based estimating and pre-construction management software, offering contractors new levels of process efficiency, information accuracy, and team collaboration. Our online platform combines CRM, cost estimating, digital takeoffs, bid-day analysis, and reporting in a single powerful solution -- all with 24/7 access from any computer or mobile device.

similar_products.short_desc: InEight  Construction Estimating software helps you create more accurate and timely project estimates and improve the project ROI.
similar_products.features: InEight Construction Estimating software includes industry-leading features that are optimized for construction cost estimating and construction budget management. Our software allows your teams to have complete control of construction cost management. We can help you increase by 25% the amount of work estimated by your current staff. With our software, you can streamline the construction estimating process and deliver more projects on time and on budget.

similar_products.short_desc: Buildxact is a simple, online estimating and project management tool for builders that allows you to estimate quickly & easily.
similar_products.features:
Accurate estimates in a fraction of the time. 
Create professional quotes quickly. Turn estimates into professional quotes incorporating your branding with just the click of a button. Impress your customers with detailed specifications, images and breakdowns of any PC/PS items.

Estimating software designed for residential builders and remodelers. Do on-screen takeoffs and connect with your dealer for live pricing. Super easy-to-learn, with training included in your subscription.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Architecture software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Architecture tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Architecture software is project management software designed for the architecture, construction, and engineering industries. Contractors, architects and engineers use these tools to develop and refine designs for new products, as well as manage current projects and job proposals. Architecture software is related to Construction Estimating software, Construction CRM software, and Construction Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Construction Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Construction Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Construction accounting software automates accounting, job costing and loan servicing functions for the construction, architecture, and engineering industries. Construction accounting software offer comprehensive management and reporting tools for construction breakdowns, budgets, expenditures, change orders, cost-over-runs and completion progress. Additionally, construction accounting provides standard monthly accounting available from your traditional construction accounting system. Accounting software is related to Construction Estimating software, Construction CRM software and Construction Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Construction CRM software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Construction CRM tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Construction CRM software encompasses Customer Relationship Management applications targeted specifically to the construction industry. It allows building professionals to not only store information about their clients and potential customers but also to track ongoing projects and sales efforts. Construction CRM software is related to Construction Management software, Construction Accounting software, Architectural Drafting software, Construction Estimating software, Customer Satisfaction software and Customer Relationship Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Construction Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Construction Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Construction management and construction project management software coordinates business processes for contractors and builders. Organizations use construction management systems to enable collaborative workflow and data access, integrating multiple teams and office locations into a shared work environment. These building software solutions also provide scheduling and real time completion data, including: monitoring of product status, start and finish dates, budgets and expenditures. They also typically offer tools for data organization and presentation, such as construction templates. Construction Management software is related to Construction Accounting software, Architectural Drafting software, Construction CRM software and Construction Estimating software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Home Builder software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Home Builder tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Home Builder software provides construction management solutions specialize for residential builders and contractors. Features typically include job costing, sales and inventory management, scheduling and hours tracking, and accounting tools. Home builders may also be interested in Construction Estimating software, Construction Accounting software, Architecture software, Construction Management software, and Construction CRM software.
